author: andschwa
body:

This resolves #928. This is a breaking change in that you _must_ be
running a recent version of .NET CLI.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Hold, making a few more changes.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Please include changes for

```
C:\projects\powershell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management\project.json(39,16): warning DOTNET1015: The 'compile' option is deprecated. Use 'compile' in 'buildOptions' instead
```

```
C:\projects\powershell\src\powershell\project.json(17,16): warning DOTNET1015: The 'content' option is deprecated. Use 'publishOptions' to publish or 'copyToOutput' in 'buildOptions' to copy to build output instead.
```

(I assume that's why you said "hold on" :) )

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors, yes, that and I'm cleaning up other build cruft. Might as well do it now.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors I don't like what they've done to content: you need _both_ `copyToOutput` and `publish`, so they're duplicated.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Why so? `copyToOutput` for `dotnet build` and `publish` for `dotnet publish`?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: > Note 1: content was used to specify files to be copied both to build output and publish output. That functionality is being split into two using copyToOutput and publishOptions respectively.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This includes some much needed updates to `Start-PSBootstrap` so that Linux and OS X run with dotnet preview 2. I should probably update docs.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors I think we're good here other than docs (maybe).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Out-of-band sign-off from @vors. Merging when tests finish.

title: Rename compilationOptions to buildOptions in project.json files
